name: Garden Slime
description:
Garden Slime is an early prototype made for Ludum Dare 51.

As our first joint game dev experience, Garden Slime is a slime simulation game focused on caring for and ultimately breeding different slimes together. Slimes will go about their business while you influence what they interact with.

The game will get progressively more chaotic as a new slime egg gets added to the garden every 10 seconds!

Controls:

Drag & Drop - Move the various slimes, eggs, and ball wherever you like
Arrow Keys - There's a sleeping slime who you can move however you like
Space Bar - Opens the slime stat menu
Escape - Opens the main menu

Debug Commands

1 - Hurt currently selected slime
3 - Spawns a new slime egg
